娭娭娭

娭字的基本解释

娭
xī
玩乐；嬉戏：“国富强而法立兮，属贞臣而日娭。”
古时对妇女的贱称。

娭
āi
〔娭她（
婢女。ji?）〕方言，ａ．祖母；ｂ．对年老妇女的尊称。

娭字的汉语字典释义

[①]［xī］
［《廣韻》許其切，平之，曉。］
“嬉1”的古字。
(1)嬉戏。
(2)喜，乐。
[②]［āi］
［《集韻》於開切，平咍，影。］
(1)女婢。
(2)见“娭2毑”。

娭字的康熙字典解释

【丑集下】【女字部】　娭； 康熙笔画：10； 页码：页263第20
〔古文〕毐【廣韻】許其切【集韻】虛其切，?音煕。婦人賤稱。　又戲也。【漢·安世房中歌】神來燕娭。　又【集韻】於開切，音哀。婢也。　又倚亥切，音唉。義同。　【六書故】娭媐嬉誒通。

娭字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
娭字的起名意思

嬉戏，玩乐。也尊称年老的妇女。

Sorrow
Basic explanation of words
Sorrow
xī
Play; play: "The country is prosperous and strong, but the law is strong; it belongs to the zhenchen and the day's daughter."
A bad name for women in ancient times.
Sorrow
āi
〔She's (
Maid. ji?)] Dialect, a. Grandmother; b. Honorific title for elderly women.
Sorrow
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［xī］
["Guangyun" Xu Qiqie, Pingzhi, Xiao. ]
The ancient word for "play 1".
(1) Playful.
(2) Hi, happy.
[②] [āi]
["Ji Yun" in the opening cut, flat 咍, shadow. ]
(1) The maidservant.
(2) See "娭2毑".
Sorrow
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Chou Ji 2] [Female Character Department] 　娭; Kangxi Strokes: 10; Page Number: Page 263 No. 20
[Ancient text] 毐[Guangyun] Xu Qiqie [Jiyun] Virtual Qiqie,? Yinxi. The woman is called a shame.　Play again. [Han·An Shi Fangzhong Song] God comes to Yanna.　[Jiyun] Yu Kaiqi, the sound is sad. The maidservant too.　 Leaning on Haiqi again, sound alas. The same meaning.　【Six Book History】women and women play together.
Sorrow

Old glyph
Sorrow
Name meaning
Play and have fun. Also honored as an elderly woman.
xī, āi
сущ.
1) xī играть, забавляться, развлекаться
宴娭 пировать и веселиться
2) āi презр. баба; девка
